00019 // TODO: template can be avoided by using a cast and hiding this cast in a method... (peter_p)
00020 template<class Item> class AbstractMenuListModel : public AbstractListBoxModel {
00021     typedef AbstractListBoxModel Base;
00022 
00023     public:
00025         AbstractMenuListModel();
00026 
00028         AbstractMenuListModel(INT n_items, INT selected_index);
00029 
00030         AbstractMenuListModel(INT n_items);
00031 
00033         void Init(INT n_items, INT selected_index);
00034         void Init(INT n_items) {
00035             Init(n_items, 0);
00036         }
00037 
00041         void AddItem(Item *item, Item *after);
00042         void AddItem(Item *item) {
00043             AddItem(item, 0);
00044         }
00045 
00047         void RemoveItem(Item *item);
00048 
00050         void RemoveAllItems();
00051 
00053         Item* GetFirstItem() const;
00054 
00056         Item* GetItemForIndex(INT index) const;
00057 
00058     private:
00059         LinkedList<Item> m_items;
00060 };
00061 
00063 class AbstractMenuList : public AbstractListBox {
00064     typedef AbstractListBox Base;
00065 
00066     public:

00121 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00122     Init
00123     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00124 template<class Item> void AbstractMenuListModel<Item>::Init(INT n_items, INT selected_index)
00125 { 
00126     Base::Init(n_items, selected_index); 
00127 }   // Init
00128 
00129 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130     AddItem
00131     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00132 template<class Item> void AbstractMenuListModel<Item>::AddItem(Item *item, Item *after)
00133 {
00134     if (after == 0)
00135         m_items.PushBack(item);
00136     else
00137         m_items.Insert(item, after);
00138 
00139     SetItemCount(GetItemCount() + 1);
00140 }   // AddItem
00141 
00142 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143     RemoveItem
00144     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00145 template<class Item> void AbstractMenuListModel<Item>::RemoveItem(Item *item)
00146 {
00147     ASSERT_DEBUG(GetNoOfItems() > 0);
00148 
00149     m_items.Remove(item);
00150     SetItemCount(GetItemCount() - 1);
00151 }   // RemoveItem
00152 
00153 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154     RemoveAllItems
00155     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00156 template<class Item> void AbstractMenuListModel<Item>::RemoveAllItems()
00157 {   
00158     while (GetItemCount() > 0)
00159         RemoveItem(m_items.GetFront());
00160 }   // RemoveAllItems
00161 
00162 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163     GetFirstItem
00164     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00165 template<class Item> Item* AbstractMenuListModel<Item>::GetFirstItem() const
00166 {
00167     return m_items.GetFront();
00168 }   // GetFirstItem
00169 
00170 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171     GetItemForIndex
00172     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00173 template<class Item> Item* AbstractMenuListModel<Item>::GetItemForIndex(INT index) const
00174 {
00175     INT curr_index = 0;
00176     Item *item = m_items.GetFront();
00177     while ((item != 0) && (curr_index != index)) {
00178         item = item->GetNext();
00179         curr_index++;
00180     }
00181 
00182     return item;
00183 }   // GetItemForIndex
